description: Cross-platform hooks for AI-assisted development workflow

_notes.platforms: Valid values: cursor, claude, gemini, copilot
_notes.cursor_limitation: Cursor lacks PreToolUse (no blocking). auto-format is 'nice to have', Husky pre-commit guarantees formatting
_notes.copilot_limitation: Copilot uses same format as Cursor (camelCase events, no Notification)
_notes.sync_behavior: sync-hooks.sh reads 'platforms' field to generate platform-specific configs

auto-format.description: Auto-format files with prettier after edits (Cursor/Copilot: best-effort, Husky guarantees)

protect-secrets.description: Block edits to sensitive files (.env, .key, .pem, etc.)
